room_title: Escape room "Murder Mystery" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: We had a great time in the Murder Hotel Room last Sunday. "Barb" was helpful, but not TOO helpful, and we beat the room at literally the last second. Such fun -- we'll be back!

room_title: Escape room "Murder Mystery" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: We did the Murder Mystery room last night and had a great time. The room was a challenge but we eventually made it out. Kiersten was great as our front desk host. Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "Murder Mystery" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: Went here today for a work team building activity. We were a part of 8. We did a murder mystery. It really challenges you to think and work together. It was very fun. Justin was our host. We had a lot of fun. I have always wanted to try an escape room, and I am glad that my first experience went so well. I would highly recommend this company for private or work-related fun.

room_title: Escape room "Murder Mystery" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: I'm blown away at Exit Strategy. MiMi, Justin, and Jasmine were FANTASTIC. We did Murder Mystery in the AM and we loved it so much, we came back after lunch to do Gone. Wonderful people and amazing games. I can't wait to come back, already working on getting my work team to come with me! I LOVE THIS PLACE!

room_title: Escape room "Murder Mystery" by Exit Strategy in Charlotte
review: Went yesterday with a group of coworkers and we did the Murder Mystery with Christy, or "Lola" as her villain name, and it was awesome! Really looking forward to going again, I want to do bank heist next!
